mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GENERAL_POST_HASHTAG (GENERAL_POST_HASHTAG_ID , HASHTAG_ID , GENERAL_POST_ID) VALUES ( 'GH-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_GENERAL_POST_HASHTAG_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{hashtagId} , #{generalPostId})
mapper.select: SELECT CC.CODE_CONTENT , GP.GENERAL_POST_ID FROM GENERAL_POST GP INNER JOIN GENERAL_POST_HASHTAG GPH ON GP.GENERAL_POST_ID = GPH.GENERAL_POST_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.CODE_ID = GPH.HASHTAG_ID WHERE GP.GENERAL_POST_ID = #{_parameter}
